benchmark_details.name: DocOIE (Document-level Context-Aware Dataset for OpenIE)
benchmark_details.overview: DocOIE consists of 800 expert-annotated sentences from 80 documents, enabling OpenIE models to take relevant contexts for accurate tuple extraction.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To extract relational tuples with document-level contexts.

data.annotation: Expert annotation by two OpenIE experts.

methodology.calculation: Precision, Recall, and F1 Score are computed based on tuple extraction matches.
methodology.interpretation: Higher values in Precision, Recall, and F1 Score indicate better performance in tuple extraction.
methodology.baseline_results: DocIE model benchmarks against various traditional OpenIE models and demonstrates improved extraction accuracy.
methodology.validation: Annotation consistency achieved 89.9% F1 score among expert annotators.
